programme.desc: We follow along as a decommissioned ship is sunk to create a new artificial reef, much to the delight of divers and anglers. Plus, Adapt-Able SCUBA makes underwater adventure possible for those who didnt think it was.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: A beautiful beach day and confident anglers is the perfect scenario to prove tarpon never play by the rules. Justin & Meredith get a dose of tarpon psychology and begin to second guess their angling skills.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin and Meredith return to the chase after taking a lesson from finicky tarpon. This time, they pay close attention to how hooks and presentations affect their odds of a strike.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Todd Jones jumps on Justins boat for a sight fishing dream day. After success along the beach, they turn to handlining for Goliath grouper and witness the amazing survival saga of the worlds luckiest fish.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The Odyssea Sportfishing family grows as Casey Villone comes aboard as Rush's new deck hand. While Rush gained a helping hand on his charters, he also scored a new "Fishing Mate" who is always game to bend a rod. With a day off and a report of Tuna offshore, the two head out to see if they can beat the sharks and land a Key West sushi dinner.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Rush teams up with longtime friend and fellow angler Jesus Diaz for a well-earned "busman's holiday" in the beautiful waters of Key West. Even on a day off, these two can't resist seeing what's going to bite. Taking the wind and the tides into account, the duo maps out a strategic circuit through Key West's surrounding waters to target cobia, grouper, snapper, and tuna for a busy day "off" work.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Water quality is everythingand the Star brite - SeaSafe team is back at it for the second year in a row! Led by Cory Redwine, Conservation Director of Project SeaSafe, this is the 4th Annual Clean Water Collective and its bigger than ever. This time, were in Grant, Florida, where 4 million clams are being released into the Indian River Lagoon, paired with the planting of thousands of mangroves, oyster work by CCA and trash clean ups to help restore one of Floridas most critical ecosystems. But its not just about hard workits about connection. With local captains, fishing legends, and the Local Knowledge crew on hand, we hit the water to show why this place is worth fighting for. From clam drops by drone, to in-water mangrove planting, to monster snook catches, this is hands-on conservation at its best. This two-part series kicks off with action, heart, and the kind of hope only a healthy waterway can bring. Dont miss Part 1where conservation meets community and everyone gets their hands wet.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: As part of this year's Star brite Sea Safe event, we hit the water to experience some of the incredible fishing the Indian River Lagoon has to offer. For Rush, that meant some serious bow time with close friend Alex Hughey - on the hunt for some of the biggest snook we've ever encountered. The bite wasn't easy, but that didn't stop Rush from smashing his personal best - not once, but twice - in one unforgettable day on the water. Don't miss this action-packed episode of the Sea Safe adventure from beautiful Sebastian, Florida!

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: In Episode 2: New Orleans, Josh links up with Mason Hereford (owner of award-winning sandwich shop Turkey and the Wolf) and then hits the road for some epic hog hunting, swamp fishing, crawfish and oyster harvesting, and exploring Louisianas only water buffalo dairy farm. It all culminates in one incredible feast featuring unique regional dishes prepared by Mason with the help of some local friends.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his familys traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, hell meet plenty of farmers and foragersharvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor take Sergeant Major (r) Jamey Caldwell fishing out of Hawks Cay for some grouper and tarpon action in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Sergeant Major (r) Jamey Caldwell brings some game changing technology along as he joins Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor for some nighttime tarpon fishing at the Long Key Bridge.

programme.title: saltwater experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Sam Milazzo to find the elusive daytime Swordfish but run into some great Dolphin fishing on the way.

programme.title: saltwater experience
programme.desc: "Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor patiently pursue big tarpon from the Everglades to the Middle Keys with fly rod in hand."

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Richard Black for an exciting adventure in Key Largo, catching a wide variety of fish species on the shallow reef.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Jeff Malone to find a frenzy of exciting Bluefish near Marathon, FL.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: When it comes to fishing in Key West, you can often get a lot done in a little bit of time. After an early check in to Oceans Edge Resort and a mid day departure from then dock, Ali looks to Rush to put him on an afternoon bite of tuna and bottom fish that few other places can offer. If Rush is going to deliver, he will need to make a plan and stick to it to make the best use of this limited time.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: For Ali and Rush, one of the best aspects of fishing is being able to share experiences on the water with interesting people. On this episode we invite luxury watch enthusiast Eric Rivera - AKA "Watch Eric" to the Florida Keys to target Permit and Amberjack in the Gulf.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Destination Dive
programme.desc: We highlight organizations and programs making a difference in the Florida Keys. Learn how they help protect and restore these vital ecosystems.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: New. York. City. Thats where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredientsfrom sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintans kitchen.

programme.title: Hard Truths of Conservation
programme.desc: Heading to one of the great wilderness areas of North America, Dan Cabela is in search of Stone Sheep in British Columbia. Joining scientists, they embark on an ambitious conservation project to help conserve this incredible species.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff team up with their friends from Boss Shotshells in South Dakota for a high-energy upland hunt, pursuing wild pheasants with the help of skilled hunting dogs. The adventure takes a quirky turn with a visit to the iconic Corn Palace.

programme.title: Fox Hollow Outdoors
programme.desc: Michael and Larken Letchworth set out on a new adventure, exploring food fishing and the great outdoors. This father son duo are making memories that will last a lifetime and will forever be etched in the digital world.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: From country music star Brian Kelleys big 56 Sunny Briggs Sportfishing Yacht, to getting caught in a storm aboard a small Hurricane deck boat in the Gulf of Mexico, this episode of Stomping Grounds has host Ryan McVinney exploring boat culture in Floridas Panhandle region, from the Emerald Coast to The Big Bend and the Forgotten Coast. Brian Kelley, aka Beach Cowboy, or BK for short, makes up one half of the country music group Florida Georgia Line (FGL) and has just released his own solo album Sunshine State of Mind. Kelley invites viewers aboard his vessel the Brittney Marie which was named after his wife, for a look at the couples Stomping Grounds. Songs from his album play on the boats sound system - including a tune about shopping for a boat on Boat Trader

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team does a deep dive into a product founded by Engineered Marine Coatings called the Genius Bucket. The Genius Bucket being the ultimate DIY paint kit for those looking to tackle a marine painting job on there own. The team also checks out the capabilities it takes to restoring the older metal rub rail which derived from the Glastron project.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Join Captain Josh and Sheriff Eric Aden for a day of fishing and fun in Destin, Florida. These two friends hit the water, catching fish both offshore and inshore, and reeling in some impressive catches. With plenty of laughs, great stories, and a few surprises along the way, this episode is all about the joy of fishing and the bond between two guys who love the sea.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: In rural Wisconsin, we follow the Yackley family who has dedicated their lives to competitive shooting. The five-member crew is the most decorated family in shooting sports. Becky Yackley gives tips to new shooters and then teams up with Chris Keefer to review Winchester USA Ready.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt Justin & Merediths beautiful Panama City Beach morning is met with a slack tide so a new path to redfish success is found under a popular bridge.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: If you had a blank check to build the best fishing boat possible, what would you create? Capt. Justin gets his wish, but it doesnt come quickly or easily.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin takes a fellow guide on his new boat to see how it measures up. Using only public waypoints on his Humminbird unit, they find exploring to be as much fun as it is fruitful.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Capt. Justin heads offshore, dodges storms and shows how the "Return 'Em Right" program is saving fish that experience barotrauma.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff embark on a 20-day mission into the Everglades to find the invasive pythons that are plaguing the ecosystem. These apex predators have eliminated more than 90% of fur-bearing animals in their new home. Can they turn the tide, or is the Everglades already lost?

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff get bit by catfish in Southern Oklahoma with YouTuber Nate Williams of Adrenaline Rush Adventures while using the most primitive fishing tactic - hand fishing. Learn from the Chickasaw Nation about the history of this method that has been used by Native Americans for thousands of years.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff dive into the wild waters off Hawaiis coast, coming face-to-face with sharks and graceful manta rays. The adrenaline peaks when Kyle takes a heart-pounding leap off a towering 40-foot cliff, making this adventure as daring as it is unforgettable.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle and Jeff explore the breathtaking Waipio Valley, the Hawaiian "Valley of the Kings," in search of prawns and bullfrogs. Their adventure continues up a massive volcano, hunting invasive rams, before ending with a feast of native fish paired with island fruits and spices.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson and his father Earl have spent six thrilling days immersed in the wilds of Tanzania, exploring the heart of Africa. Next on their adventure, they set out to hunt the elusive Chandler's Mountain Reed buck. However, the raging river poses a formidable challenge, making it too dangerous to cross. Undeterred, they adapt by using alternative means of transportation. Armed with their trusty Gunwerks rifles, they navigate the rugged terrain, determined to get close to these elusive creatures amidst the stunning and challenging landscape.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is in the final stretch of completing the South America Upland Slam. Having already checked off nine species in Argentina, he now finds himself in Peru, where he faces the challenge of tracking down two elusive species to complete his list: the Andean Tinamou and the Western Peruvian Dove.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Join Mark Peterson as he continues his hunting adventure in the stunning landscapes of Maasai Land, Tanzania. Mark moves to a different camp in this episode to pursue a Gerenuk, known for its long neck and unique browsing habits. He soon after turns his attention to the East African Impala.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Join Mark Peterson as he heads to Kentucky for the late muzzleloader season. Already having an unforgettable season so far after taking Freak Show back in early September, he is looking to cap off his Kentucky season with a great buck with his Muzzleloader.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Join Mark Peterson as he ventures into Croatias wild heart, hot on the trail of a legendary stag. In the midst of the rutting seasons deafening roars, tensions escalate as Mark closes the distance.Equipped with his Gunwerks 7LRM, things get dicey as Mark is face to face with a roaring stag at 12 yards!

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is south of the border in Veracruz, Mexico going after a Mexican Gulf Coast Whitetail. When the whitetail action slowed down, Mark tried his luck at a spot-and stalk hunt for White-lipped Peccary. With hot temps, Mark and company try to find water that the Peccary will be targeting to stay hydrated.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark continues his quest in Croatia, and on the third day, they decide to venture to the coast where he will pursue his hunt on one of the numerous islands that permit hunting (Dugi Otok Island). Armedwith his trusted Gunwerks 7LRM Rifle, Mark prepares to stalk the diverse array of exotic animals inhabiting these islands, offering him a rich selection of prey to choose from.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Mark Peterson is in Ethiopia hunting Mountain Nyala. After the first two days, Mark has taken a Meneliks Bushbuck and a Colobus Monkey but no Mountain Nyala. Finally, on Day 3 the hunting party receives the green light from the military to hunt in the area they wanted. It's time to put the Gunwerks rifle to the test.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: JP heads to Lake Simcoe for some late Spring, post spawn Yellow Perch fishing action.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: JP targets the Kawartha Lakes region of Ontario, looking for post spawn Walleye opportunities.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: JP flies to British Columbia to tackle 4 fisheries using 4 different techniques targeting some of the regions popular species.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: Join WoodHaven's Mike Pentecost as he kicks off his Alabama turkey season - these mountain birds are tough to hunt!

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: WoodHavens Josh Anderson heads to the Western Plains of Kansas in pursuit of a mature whitetail buck. Because of the wide open terrain, a decoy and blind calling can be very affective because of the visibility. After a few well-timed grunts on the Intimidator grunt call, a shooter buck shows up right at the base of the tree!

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: A heaven sent early morning turkey hunt with Colten and Mark Scroggins. The Apex Turkey Ninja TSS will make you a believer in killing turkeys with a .410!

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: Mark Scroggins and his family are in Oklahoma and spot a big gobbler from the road. They are pretty sure they can get in position to call him in but they have to be quick without being seen. His step-daughter Destiny is behind the trigger and Mark just about puts this ol gobbler in her lap!

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: Colten Scroggins and the whole family return to the blind to see if they can call one of the other gobblers back in to their setup. A family that hunts together stays together!

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: Mike and Jacob are hunting an old turkey "Meanie" they have some history with on public land. Mike demos the WoodHaven box call clip.

programme.title: The WoodHaven Way
programme.desc: Colten & Mark Scroggins is in Oklahoma during the peak rut, chasing mature whitetail bucks! With bucks on the move and searching for does, it's the perfect time to break out the calls. Watch as Mark and Colten pull out all the stopsgetting aggressively loud with the WoodHaven "Intimidator" Grunt Callto turn a cruising buck and bring him right into bow range at the blind.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike tries to hold his own while fishing with Nick Fischer and Liza Fitzgerald in south seas Captiva. Good luck buddy.

programme.desc: The usual suspects return for a new breakneck, ocean-to-ocean free for all!

programme.desc: A travel writer hates to travel and loves order, until everything changes.

programme.desc: An arms dealer attempts to sell war planes to a South American dictator.

programme.desc: A couple's trip takes a detour to a mansion filled with contraptions.

programme.desc: Mischievous Bo Duke and Luke Duke are sentenced to a summer of hard work.

programme.desc: A young man takes a job at a small firm where he gets embroiled in a scam.

programme.desc: Martians delight in incinerating humans in Tim Burton's sci-fi send-up.

programme.title: Caddyshack II
programme.desc: The snobs of Bushwood Country Club don't know who they're messing with.

programme.title: Funny Farm (1988)
programme.desc: A city slicker moves his family to the country with disastrous results.

programme.title: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
programme.desc: A jungle man is raised from infancy by apes in this wild adventure.

programme.title: Ghosts of Mississippi
programme.desc: A district attorney reopens the case against the murderer of Medgar Evers.

programme.title: Arthur (1981)
programme.desc: A drunken playboy decides to give up his inheritance for true love.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A lonely woman's discovery of a man's letter in a bottle leads to love.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: After a murder inside the Louvre, symbolist Robert Langdon finds clues in Da Vincis paintings, which leads to a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: The final assignment for a retiring temporal agent is to stop the one criminal whos eluded him throughout time from committing mass murder in 1975.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Former cop Tom Carver makes his living cleaning up crime scenes, but when he unintentionally joins a criminal cover-up, he has to think fast.

programme.title: Wind Chill
programme.desc: On their way home for the holidays, two college students break down on a deserted road and are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who died there.

programme.title: Dragon Wars
programme.desc: Once in 500 years, ancient mythical creatures come to Earth, wreaking havoc and destruction. This time they must be stopped for good.

programme.title: Straw Dogs
programme.desc: A Los Angeles screenwriter and his actress wife relocate to her hometown in the deep South, where a dispute with locals turns deadly.

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars as a former district attorney who gets kidnapped by three criminals who are plotting to pull of a major bank heist.

programme.title: Into Thin Air: Death on Everest
programme.desc: The compelling and dramatic true story of two teams of hikers as they made their dangerous and fatal ascent on Mt. Everest in early 1996.

programme.title: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A stubborn rancher in his twilight years takes on the U.S. government when the Air Force tries to expropriate his New Mexico land for a missile range.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Montana, this is the tale of a Colonel and his three sons who compete for the affections of the same young woman.

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: True story of a cocky Austrian mountain climber who escapes an Indian prison camp during WWII and goes to Tibet where he befriends the Dalai Lama.

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: The hit film version of the bestselling book about a Montana family and the relationship between two brothers with completely different personalities.

programme.title: All the Pretty Horses
programme.desc: The dreams of an American wanting to live the cowboy way in Mexico become a web of murder and betrayal when he falls for a powerful mans daughter.

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: A young public relations exec goes on a remarkably disastrous blind date that threatens to upend his entire life while opening him up to true love.

programme.title: Buddy
programme.desc: In this charming adaptation of Gertrude Lintz's autobiography, a brave, loving, eccentric socialite attempts to raise an 800-pound gorilla as her son.

programme.title: Private Valentine: Blonde & Dangerous
programme.desc: Megan Valentine was America's sweetheart. After the movie star suddenly becomes broke, she joins the Army, learning to live a life without luxury.

programme.title: Whatever It Takes
programme.desc: A romantic teen comedy about the lengths that people will go to land their ideal partneronly to discover that reality doesn't live up to the fantasy.

programme.title: Calendar Girl
programme.desc: It's 1962 and three friends just out of high school journey to Hollywood determined to meet the object of their shared obsession: Marilyn Monroe.

programme.title: The Waterdance
programme.desc: Injured in a climbing accident, writer Joel Garcia (Eric Stoltz) wakes up in a hospital having lost the use of his legs. Soon after, he's placed in a recovery ward where he begins the arduous process of rehabilitation and meets others with injuries like his own. Raymond (Wesley Snipes) is a ladies' man whose girl has nevertheless split, and Bloss (William Forsythe) is a rather prejudiced biker. Together, this unlikely trio helps one another to overcome the greatest challenge of their lives.

programme.title: Places in the Heart
programme.desc: This stirring drama follows a widow as she struggles to raise her two children and save her Texas farm during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Swept From the Sea
programme.desc: Amy, a servant girl, and Yanko, the sole survivor of a capsized ship bound for America, begin a fiery affair at the end of the nineteenth century.

programme.title: Dr. Strangelove Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
programme.desc: Based on Peter George's book "Red Alert."

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: In this fast-paced potboiler, a district attorney begins having an affair with a staid librarian, who ultimately gets pregnant with their child.

programme.title: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
programme.desc: After arriving in Shanghai in the middle of a revolution, an engaged American missionary is captured and slowly seduced by an infamous warlord.

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: In this stylish spy thriller, a Londoner working in British Intelligence, Alexander Eberlin, turns out to be a Russian counter-espionage agent.

programme.title: Scandal Sheet
programme.desc: After accidentally killing his ex-wife, an editor of a tabloid newspaper discovers that his ace reporters are investigating the story.

programme.title: Born Yesterday
programme.desc: Brassy blonde moll Billie Dawn (Judy Holliday) hits Washington, D.C., with her unscrupulous millionaire sugar daddy, Harry Brock (Broderick Crawford), and his sleazy lawyer, Jim Devery (Howard St. John), who has been pressuring Harry to marry Billie by pointing out that a wife cannot be forced to testify against her husband. In an effort to make Billie more socially acceptable, Harry hires journalist Paul Verrall (William Holden) to smarten her up -- and sparks soon fly between the pair.

programme.title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: The heroic mariner must clear all sorts of hurdles in the way of rescuing a princess whos been miniaturized and held captive by a ruthless magician.

programme.title: Operation Mad Ball
programme.desc: A group of enlisted men, led by Private Hogan, are tasked with planning a dance party, while trying to keep it a secret from a busy-body officer.

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Academy Award winner for Best Picture tells the story of an idealistic Southern politician brought down by his own ambition and lust for power.

programme.title: Twentieth Century
programme.desc: When down-on-his-luck Broadway impresario Oscar Jaffe (John Barrymore) meets his discovery and former flame, Lily Garland (Carole Lombard), on the glamorous 20th Century Limited train between Chicago and New York, he uses every scheme at his disposal to win the movie star back both professionally and romantically. However, Lily, along with her new beau, George (Ralph Forbes), and Jaffe's rival producer, Max Jacobs (Charles Levison), who hired Lily to star in his latest play, have other plans.

programme.title: The Awful Truth
programme.desc: Jerry (Cary Grant) and Lucy (Irene Dunne) are a married couple who doubt each other's fidelity: Jerry suspects Lucy and her music teacher (Alexander D'Arcy) of spending an evening together, and Lucy is convinced Jerry lied about a business trip. When the jealous pair file for divorce, both rush into new relationships, but quickly realize their love never died. The soon-to-be-divorced husband and wife then both scramble to spoil each other's chances for newfound romance.

programme.title: The Guns of Navarone
programme.desc: Based on the book by Alistair MacLean.

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: Tight Spot
programme.desc: A lawyer springs a wise-cracking model from jail to convince her to testify against a no-good mobster, but a besotted cop throws a wrench in the plan.

programme.title: Boots Malone
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck jockey's agent takes a wealthy, yet neglected kid under his wing, and, with the help of others, turns him into a champion.

programme.title: Murderer's Row
programme.desc: Secret agent Matt Helm must rescue the kidnapped inventor of an ultra-destructive "helio beam" capable of destroying Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The Lone Wolf and His Lady
programme.desc: When a gem disappears from an exhibition, jewel-thief-turned-reporter Lone Wolf (Ron Randell) is accused.

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: A mute boy who spends his days roaming the English countryside starts coming out of his shell when he befriends a wild pony and a retired colonel.

programme.title: Jeanne Eagels
programme.desc: A look into the life of the celebrated Broadway actress who in 1922 made her name playing Sadie Thompson in Somerset Maugham's "Rain."

programme.title: Gidget Grows Up
programme.desc: When her boyfriend leaves for the Air Force without calling, Gidget heads to New York in the name of world peace and joins the U.N. as a tour guide.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Girl
programme.desc: Fired from her job as a switchboard operator, a daffy young woman tries her hand at door-to-door cosmetics sales only to get mixed up in a murder rap.

programme.title: Twentieth Century
programme.desc: When down-on-his-luck Broadway impresario Oscar Jaffe (John Barrymore) meets his discovery and former flame, Lily Garland (Carole Lombard), on the glamorous 20th Century Limited train between Chicago and New York, he uses every scheme at his disposal to win the movie star back both professionally and romantically. However, Lily, along with her new beau, George (Ralph Forbes), and Jaffe's rival producer, Max Jacobs (Charles Levison), who hired Lily to star in his latest play, have other plans.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: During World War II, a dilapidated vessel, the Caine, gets a new ensign, Willis Keith (Robert Francis), and a new captain, Commander Queeg (Humphrey Bogart). The crew sees Queeg's unconventional behavior as irrational, and communications officer Thomas Keefer (Fred MacMurray) spreads suspicion about his suitability as captain. When a dire situation during a storm forces the executive officer (Van Johnson) to relieve Queeg of his duties, he and Ensign Keith are tried for mutiny.

programme.title: Saddles and Sagebrush
programme.desc: A rancher (Russell Hayden) joins an outlaw gang to figure out how to stop it.

programme.title: Traveling Saleswoman
programme.desc: A soapmaker's daughter (Joan Davis) goes to the Wild West, followed by her boyfriend (Andy Devine).

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: An Arizona land-grabber (Telly Savalas) and his brother (George Maharis) renew their feud amid Army troops and Apaches.

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: Jed Cooper (Victor Mature), a trapper, enlists as an army fort scout, and shortly after meets and falls for Corinna Marston (Anne Bancroft), the wife of a nearby fort's commander. Jed comes across her husband, Col. Marston (Robert Preston), after he's suffered an attack at the hands of Native Americans. Col. Marston forces the captain of Jed's fort, Glenn Riordan (Guy Madison), to send out Jed and the troops to fight his attackers, despite their lack of battle experience.

programme.title: The Hawk of Wild River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) has himself thrown in jail to trick an outlaw known as the Hawk (Clayton Moore) and bring him and his entire gang to justice.

programme.title: A Tornado in the Saddle
programme.desc: Ranchers and a new sheriff (Russell Hayden) have trouble with a gold rush.

programme.title: Streets of Ghost Town
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) look for stolen gold with a history.

programme.title: Secret of Treasure Mountain
programme.desc: An Apache curse hangs over good guys (Valerie French, William Prince) and a villain (Raymond Burr) seeking Spanish gold.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: Rancher Lee Hackett (Van Heflin) spends so much time trying to keep the violent streak of his son Ed (Tab Hunter) in check, he neglects the needs of his other son Davy (James Darren). When Ed's temper results in the death of an innocent Native American, Lee tries his best to cover his son's tracks by making a deal with unscrupulous horse trader Jensen (Ray Teal), who falsely testifies on Ed's behalf. But it becomes clear that Ed can't change, and a shootout between father and son ensues.

programme.title: The Black Dakotas
programme.desc: A Confederate plot to turn the Sioux against the Union crumbles when a double agent makes off with a shipment of gold.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Dan Evans (Van Heflin), a drought-plagued Arizona rancher, volunteers to take captured stagecoach robber and murderer Ben Wade (Glenn Ford) from Bisbee to Contention City, where the criminal will be put aboard the 3:10 train to Yuma for his trial. Accompanied only by the town drunk, Alex Potter (Henry Jones), Dan battles Wade's henchman (Richard Jaeckel), the murder victim's revenge-minded brother, and the temptation of the large bribe Wade offers in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Battle of Rogue River
programme.desc: A cavalry major (George Montgomery) makes peace with Indians despite an agitator (Richard Denning) working for carpetbaggers.

programme.title: A Man Called Sledge
programme.desc: In the Old West, a gunfighting outlaw connives his way into a jail with the goal of stealing a large shipment of gold stored in the prison.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) tries to stop an Army scout and a band of outlaws from starting an American Indian war.

programme.title: The White Squaw
programme.desc: A Swedish settler (David Brian) starts a war when he tries to drive Dakotas off their Wyoming reservation.

programme.title: Go West, Young Lady
programme.desc: A vicious outlaw called Pecos Pete (Onslow Stevens) has long tormented the peaceful residents of a small frontier town. So these desperate people hire a dedicated new sheriff, Tex Miller (Glenn Ford), to bring this ruffian to justice. But, for all his determination, Tex is tricked by Pete and led into an ambush. Ultimately, it is the wily and brassy transplant Belinda "Bill" Pendergast (Penny Singleton) who uncovers Pete's true identity and plots a way to run him out of town once and for all.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small western community turn on Jim Guthrie (Dana Andrews) when he becomes the prime suspect for a murder he didn't commit. Before getting a chance to prove his innocence, Jim is driven from his home and into the wilderness, where he is left for dead. Despite the danger, he comes back years later, discovering that he's still a wanted man. But a kindhearted local named Chris (Dianne Foster) believes his story, and together they begin a desperate search for the true culprit.

programme.title: 40 Guns to Apache Pass
programme.desc: A cavalry captain (Audie Murphy) rescues settlers and catches a corporal (Kenneth Tobey) selling rifles to Apaches.

programme.title: The Parson and the Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Anthony Dexter) retires from the outlaw life, fakes his own death and adopts the name William Bonney. Soon, William runs into Jack Slade (Sonny Tufts), a gun-toting stranger who is itching for a gunfight. Jack falls in with a group of thugs terrorizing William's town. The Rev. Jericho Jones (Buddy Rogers) exhorts William to defend the townspeople, and, when William's maid, Tonya (Marie Windsor), is beaten by the thugs, he grabs his pistol.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: Return to Warbow
programme.desc: Three escaped convicts return to collect the money that the brother of one of them has already spent.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: The conniving Ed Barker (Dick Curtis) murders a rancher and tries to steal the ranch from his widow, Jean Andrews (Ann Doran). However, their old friend Cliff Houston (Charles Starrett) appears on the scene to try and save the day. He makes a deal with Barker and his crew to drive the Andrews herd to market and split the money, but each man really plans to con the other as soon as the time is right. Along for the ride is singing cowboy Bob Stevens (Bob Nolan).

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

Shortly after robbing a retired actor's home. programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Whilst the Upper Marshwood hunt assemble outside the village inn, a filthy tramp-like man leaves the shop and skulks into the wood. Soon after, he hears the sound of the hunt begin and the unforgettable noise of the horses and hounds in hot pursuit of the fox. Running for cover, towards the safety of his home-made shelter, he stumbles and falls into a pit - screaming. LIZA, isolated in the disused railway carriage which constitutes her home, moves deeper into the wood having heard the scream. programme.title: The One
programme.desc: On their last dates before moving to the mansion, Ashley puts her dry spell behind her and rediscovers her sensual side. In a surprising twist, Brent finds himself facing rejectionuntil Kirk and Tammy suggest a promising alternative.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: Ashley and Brent host a lavish cocktail party to welcome all of their suitors to the Mansion. Things heat up between Ashley and Matthew, but the night takes a turn when Brent gets into a heated argument with one of Ashleys suitors.

programme.title: Uncensored
programme.desc: Garcelle Beauvais is best known for her role as Fancy on the hit sitcom "The Jamie Foxx Show"; she talks about her journey to a life of modeling, acting, and chasing her wildest dreams.

programme.title: Uncensored
programme.desc: Deon Cole is uncensored about his road of trial and error to becoming an award-winning comedian and actor; he started doing stand up at a Chicago comedy club and became a household name.

programme.title: Unsung
programme.desc: Deborah Cox became a worldwide star in the late 90s when her breakthrough hit Nobodys Supposed To Be Here took over the R&B charts for 14 weeks. Hailing from Toronto, Canada, she dominated the R&B and Dance charts with songs like Sentimental, We Cant Be Friends and Absolutely Not.

programme.title: Behind The Movement
programme.desc: A unique and fast paced retelling of how Rosa Parks refusal to give up her seat launched the history making Montgomery Bus Boycott. This ticking clock styled film recounts the inner workings and the behind the scenes preparation that took place in three intense days to pull the most successful boycott of it's time.

programme.title: Uncensored
programme.desc: Born to a 15-year-old single mom Tasha Smith moved to LA and worked on breaking in to stand up comedy. The urge to direct led Tasha to self-produce and direct her first short film, she has since moved on to episodic and feature length directing.

programme.title: Uncensored
programme.desc: Born and raised in New York, Tami Roman and her mom fled to Los Angeles to escape Tamis childhood sexual and physical abuse. With the help of family and friends she was able to push through and is now a celebrated reality TV star and budding comic.

programme.title: Unsung
programme.desc: Unsung Presents Best In Black: Television features stories of pioneering TV shows, from The Jeffersons and A Different World to Insecure and In Living Color, that helped change the game, and change the world.

programme.title: Unsung
programme.desc: Unsung Presents Best in Black: Film Pioneers features portraits of pioneering figures in film, from Lena Horne and Sidney Poitier to Spike Lee and Ava DuVernay, who helped change the game, and change the world.

programme.title: White Water
programme.desc: White Water is the story of a 7 year-old black kid in segregated 1963 Opelika, Alabama who becomes obsessed with the desire to taste the water from the "white's only" drinking fountain and sets out on a quest to do the unthinkable: drink from it.

programme.title: The Rickey Smiley Show
programme.desc: Rickey has a stalker.

programme.title: The Rickey Smiley Show
programme.desc: Sister Bernice plans her own funeral when she thinks shes dying. Aunt Sylvia and Simone fight over an attractive man.

programme.title: Hollywood Divas
programme.desc: Elise joins the ladies on the cruise and has to defend herself from accusations of side deals. Paula feels a fracture in her friendship with Elise. The girls visit Jamaica. Golden hosts her own acting workshop but gets offended when Elise makes a comment about doing motherhood the right way.

programme.title: Hollywood Divas
programme.desc: Paula pushes Forrest to be more involved with group project. Things get out of control and tempers flare when the ladies confront Forrest without Paula. Countess gets an offer to sing on a documentary soundtrack. Golden and Elise try to find common ground after their fallout in Jamaica.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: The house wakes up in a frenzy as the daters learn from Mieka that Brent shared his bed with one of the ladies. With the first elimination looming, will the recent events influence Brent and Ashleys decisions on who they send home?

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: The guys wake up to learn that Ashley is nowhere to be found. Meanwhile, Brent is living his best life doing a steamy yoga session and connecting with the ladies. Eventually, Ashley returns but has some explaining to do before Eliminations.

programme.title: Hollywood Divas
programme.desc: Lisas throws a mothers brunch to celebrate her mom who has cancer. Paula revisits her homeless past. Countess starts working on her vocals again with Warryn Campell, while Golden puts her business hat on with her pillow line and photo shoot.

programme.desc: The group compares their chemistry with Brent and Ashley as they take turns posing for an intimate high-end photoshoot. And a raunchy game night turns tense when Ashley gets offended, leaving the rest of the house annoyed by her reaction.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Texas gives a history lesson as cars like the Ford Phaeton four-door convertible come across the auction block, showing car lovers just how far things are from horses and buggies.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Porsche is featured in this episode along with some of the greatest vehicles the world has ever seen, all auctioned at no reserve in Scottsdale, Ariz.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The wheels are spinning as Barrett-Jackson descends on Las Vegas for the 2022 season; highlighting bidders beating the odds and taking home collectible cars.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The Barrett-Jackson Live auctions continue in Texas, introducing custom cars to the auction block; from a 1962 Chevrolet Corvette to a 1956 Ford F-100 Big Window, there is a car of choice for all car loves at the Houston auctions.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The Lone Star State does not disappoint as the Barrett-Jackson live auctions continue in Houston, Texas; attention shifts to luxury cars as models like the 2014 Bentley Continental GTC and 1991 Ferrari 348 TS Targa come across the auction block.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: From a 1971 Custom Chevy C-10 Deluxe Pick-Up all the way to a 1984 AM General M923 6x6, there is an option for every pick-up lover.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The Scottsdale Auction heats up on Super Saturday as customs, classics and moderns drive across the auction block; from a 1929 Ford Model A custom roadster to a 2020 Ford Shelby, bidding is in full swing with prices soaring into six figures.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The final week of logging's toughest season begins. Impossible goals leave no room for error, as each crew races the clock.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As the logging season winds to a close, the drama heats up. Conner fights off defeat, while the men of Pihl fight each other.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: From mountaintop to river's bottom, six crews will take on one of America's deadliest jobs.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: As the summer heats up, so do the men of the mountain. Rygaard breaks in its greenhorns, while Jay Browning takes a gamble on a new yarder operator.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: After an ill-fated road trip, Jimmy and James Smith arrive in Florida to tackle the dangerous black water of the American South, only to realize they're in way over their heads.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The forest fights back as a careless mistake at Browning threatens to take out DJ and Cody. At Rygaard, Gabe gives his greenhorns an ultimatum.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Logging country is under siege. Melvin's gung-ho attitude puts the crew in danger. Rygaard's greenhorns fight for a permanent spot on the crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Rygaard, one of the greenhorns goes AWOL, and Gabe has him on the chopping block. But he's not the only one; several loggers face the ax.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The loggers struggle to get back on track after losing a man. At Browning, a weak cable threatens to kill half the crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby's desperate dash for cash is halted when he crashes in the swamp. A monster gator stalks the S&S boys, pushing Jimmy to his breaking point.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Jimmy and James come face-to-face with the 12-foot gator that has stalked them for weeks. In the swamps of Louisiana, Shelby goes solo on a challenging mission.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Dave returns from jail but may not have a job to come back to; Shelby hunts his biggest catch of the season.

programme.desc: With only two weeks remaining in the season, the mountain is turned upside down. Browning bounces back, while Rygaard suffers a devastating loss.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rumors run wild in Orange, California when 6 lockers--owned by one tenant--go up for auction. Dave and Darrell vie for a unit with a 12 grand payday. Barry Weiss stumbles across a vintage magazine. One buyer nearly breaks a hip.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers go south to Laguna Nigel, California. This time it's Dave who doesn't buy. Jarrod and Brandi uncover rare depression era art. Barry's art goes a little further back, to the Mayan culture.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers invade the quiet town of Simi Valley, CA. Darrell and Brandon smoke the competition. Jarrod and Brandi find some safes, "release the Kraken," and walk away with literally a pirate's booty.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers venture back to the notorious vault auction, this time in Chattsworth, CA. Jarrod and Brandi find something that makes noise, if not money.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers, well most of them, head to Westminster, CA. Darrell and Brandon meet a legend. Jarrod and Brandi do the right thing.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers go to Moreno Valley, Calif.; Darrell tries to play nice; Barry Weiss lands an uncertain score.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi attempt to stay focused on a big score as Dave returns with more bluster than ever; Ivy's treasure promises fun on the high seas.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: There are roses for some and thorns for others as the buyers face off in Lake Elsinore, Calif.; Dave arrives with unanticipated optimism, but that doesn't stop him from stirring up trouble; Ivy has to pound unfamiliar pavement.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers face 10 vaults belonging to the same owner; Ivy draws a nice profit; Mary and Kenny do all of the heavy lifting.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Victorville, Calif., Ivy takes it easy and lets Ivy Jr. run the operation; Kenny feels run-down and his lack of focus lands him a locker, though there's a pleasant surprise in the end; Mary, Shana and Edwina just can't seem to make anything stick.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry rolls up to Riverside, Calif., with his own masked bidder, and the two develop a winning strategy; Brandi and Danielle's mystery balls take them to South America... sort of; Rene needs a cleanse after going through his risqu room.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: San Bernardino, Calif., brings out the warrior in Ivy, who goes up against an upstart buyer; Kenny has his eye on a locker that leaves him needing a massage; Lisa angles for a smaller unit but ends up with the catch of the day.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry believes all the whales are coming to the big auction in Fullerton as he takes Dusty under his wing to test him; Rene makes some dainty discoveries; Darrell's tool locker becomes quite eye-opening.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Laura's on her own in Moreno Valley, and she's anything but discreet about the reasons; Brandi cooks up a nice profit; Rene's doll locker yields a couple surprises, while Ivy dabbles with a bit of the supernatural.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Danielle pick an over-the-top, tiki-party-meets-rockabilly home; Frank and Robbie set their sights on a vast collection hidden in the fortified bunkers of an old army base.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: An old walnut farm in California has barns that have not seen the light of day in years and just might contain the Holy Grail of vintage workwear.

programme.desc: The guys have high hopes when they uncover a 1935 Auburn roadster on an Indiana farm, but end up with just a kiddie ride instead.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jep and Jessica move into Willie and Jase's neighborhood, Jep is sidelined with an illness, causing Willie and the Robertson family to pitch in and help Jessica get her new house ready in time for Jep's arrival home.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and the guys take John Luke golfing prior to his engagement party, their attempts at marital advice don't exactly work out as planned.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase receives a palate of fireworks as a gift, he and the guys create a homemade fireworks display for the Robertson family 4th of July barbeque. Meanwhile, Uncle Si is honored by the veterans association and given his own exhibit at a local military museum.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Phil and Jase get into an argument about which type of duck decoy works best, Jase and the guys repaint some old decoys, betting that Phil cannot tell the difference. Meanwhile, Jessica challenges Willie to a bowling contest with Kay's "Big Sista's" club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys discover they have a knack for removing pests from other people's property, they use their new talents to their advantage. Meanwhile, Willie gives Sadie and John Luke summer jobs at his diner, but first he must train them to be good employees.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When an office prank war spirals out of control, Phil volunteers Willie, Jase, and Jep to help Alan at the church, which seems more like a punishment than charity work. Meanwhile, Korie gives Kay a surprise art class taught by famous artist Pierre Matisse.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the guys spend the weekend at a hunting cabin to celebrate Martin's bachelor party, things turns explosive after they find a cache of antique black powder weapons. Meanwhile, Willie helps Kay fulfill her lifelong dream of owning a petting zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Uncle Si has a brush with death, he creates a bucket list and asks the guys to help him fulfill his dreams. Meanwhile, Kay sets out to prove to Willie and Alan that she actually graduated high school.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Duck Commander sponsors a NASCAR race, Jase and the guys get themselves in the mood by attempting to work as a pit crew. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie challenge John Luke and his fianc Mary Kate to a doubles tennis match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: In this very special wedding episode, John Luke Robertson is getting married to his fianc Mary Kate, and our cameras are with him every step of the way.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends.

programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box.

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: After several months in Hollywood, Abby returns to the Abby Lee Dance Company to find her dancers have been slacking off.

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: It's the annual Abby Lee Dance Company recital, which means two things--all the girls get to perform and Abby is a nervous wreck.

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog juggles his job and family responsibilities at the same time. He leads the search for Robert, a low-level drug dealer who makes money by selling hedge clippings as marijuana and broken Macadamia nuts as crack.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured. But Dog is charmed by Nunu's unquenchable

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain. This morning, he takes the toddler for a spin around the yard in her little red wagon.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way." There are big nuptials planned on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What better way for Dog to start his morning, than at an elementary school Career Day, inspiring a new generation of potential bounty hunters? After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. On his search he'll encounter a felon with history of violence and an alleged affection for sawed-off shotguns.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: No one becomes a bondsman overnight and even the members of Dog's team know there is always more to learn. So when Duane Lee cuts a felon a little too much slack about checking-in and then goes missing, Duane Lee knows he's gonna get schooled.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in Colorado helping a fellow bondsmen clean up his files. The target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the family visit the Rockies for a little work and lot of fun.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket--Heidi and Stephanie. Heidi is a check forger who's failed to make a court appearance.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources--the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond because 18-year-old Ginger is selling drugs and running wild.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy. Dog however has the cure--a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today the team isn't pulling any punches, literally or figuratively! In between tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland is struggling to find time to train.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.desc: Dog knows that it is better to give than to receive, so when a fellow bondsman grieving for his recently departed spouse requests his help, he jumps into action. Studying the fugitive's file the team uncovers a surprising fact.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem on his hands. One of his clients, Owen, has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: As Dog likes to say, "it's not the years it's the miles," and this goes for both men and machines. Those long hunts and the rides to jail take a toll not only on Dog but also on his vehicles.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's got a twofer on his hands, but the cases couldn't be more different. The first is a woman whose family wants her back in jail, the other is a former choirboy whose family ties are strong.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today it's the threat of sever thunderstorm, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale. But this only masks deeper problems with the couple.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The "Big Island" of Hawaii boasts both lush tropical splendor and stark volcanic beauty. But today Dog and the team can't spend much time taking in the sights, they need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district--moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters get a lead on a convicted sex offender from Nevada hiding out in a beachside resort 20 miles from the US border; the agents then set up a sting operation to capture an ex-Marine wanted for drug trafficking.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters are tracking a California man wanted for drug and firearm trafficking who thinks he's safe in a quiet Mexican beach town. Then, the agents are on the hunt for a young convicted drug trafficker who has a lot to lose.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: Stopping a woman who tries to hide her identity; the agents surround the house of a human trafficker when it bursts into flames; they hunt for a woman on the FBI's Most Wanted list and head out at night to track down an armed fugitive.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters search for a man wanted for the attempted murder of his girlfriend in San Diego; they head to a cartel-controlled area on the hunt for a convicted human trafficker; they search for a female drug smuggler who never sleeps.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters race to catch a man wanted for killing his wife in California while an American woman from rural New York ends up in prison in Mexico; the agents then help an American teenage girl get justice.

programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters race to catch a man wanted for killing his wife in California while an American woman from rural New York ends up in prison in Mexico; the agents then help an American teenage girl get justice.

programme.title: Fugitives Caught on Tape
programme.desc: LAPD ground units work with helicopter officers to catch an alleged multiple-hit-and-run suspect; deputies and police in Florida chase an alleged murder suspect; deputies in New Mexico pursue a naked woman driving recklessly on the highway.

programme.title: Fugitives Caught on Tape
programme.desc: Officers in Florida pursue a man who stole two police cars in the same day; deputies engage in a foot chase with an alleged cop killer; police respond to a report of a man attacked with a machete.

programme.title: Fugitives Caught on Tape
programme.desc: The pursuit of a convicted felon ends with a head-on collision with a police cruiser; a shoplifting suspect shoots at police and then sets his own house on fire during a standoff; air and ground units coordinate during a high-speed chase.

programme.title: Fugitives Caught on Tape
programme.desc: A truck thief streams his high-speed chase on social media; a man wanted for double murder fires shots at pursuing officers; a man caught sleeping at a traffic light flees police and crashes a high-end sports car; and more.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters get a lead on a convicted sex offender from Nevada hiding out in a beachside resort 20 miles from the US border; the agents then set up a sting operation to capture an ex-Marine wanted for drug trafficking.

programme.title: Fugitive Hunters Mexico
programme.desc: The Fugitive Hunters are tracking a California man wanted for drug and firearm trafficking who thinks he's safe in a quiet Mexican beach town. Then, the agents are on the hunt for a young convicted drug trafficker who has a lot to lose.

programme.title: UFO Conspiracy: Hunt for the Truth
programme.desc: In the 70 years since the famed Roswell UFO crash, there have been other allegations of government cover-ups involving alien phenomena; some believe there is a long history of UFO reports that have been purposely hidden from the public.

programme.title: UFOs: The White House Files
programme.desc: There has been a legacy of secrecy and controversy surrounding UFOs and extraterrestrials, a look at these powerful leaders and could they be hiding the truth about UFOs from the public.

programme.title: UFOs: Secret Missions Exposed
programme.desc: Man has always been captivated with outer space; a look at the possibility that the government has been hiding top-secret space missions involving the Moon and even Mars.

programme.title: UFOs: Secret Alien Technology
programme.desc: A look at the greatest inventions of the 20th century and could they be the products of reverse engineered alien technology.

programme.desc: For many, UFO experiences and extraterrestrial encounters have been happening for decades, but not all accounts are made public; there are those who believe that a secret entity has been covering up these stories and suppressing the witnesses.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Human bones as a "miracle cure" for gout; living mummies buried alive; a truly bizarre Victorian way to lose weight -- with tapeworms; from daily rites to once-in-a-lifetime rituals, the stranger side of human nature is revealed in these rituals.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Looking at outlandish inventions; a full-body gas mask for babies; Smell-o-Vision; a robot powered by eating slugs; inflatable airplanes; hidden cameras in contact lenses; coffin security systems.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A million bats with tiny bombs strapped to their chests, inflatable tanks, robot assassins, bazooka Vespas, and war dolphins; these weapons, and others, pushed the boundaries of "possible" in the weirdest ways ever.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings; a samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet; a man who's immune to electrocution.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Exploring the Lake Michigan Triangle and many other wild and weird places, including a creepy doll-filled island with a dark past, deadly gas-filled explosive lakes, caves that harbor deadly viruses, and the most haunted place in the United States.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of molasses; a dancing plague that kills 100 people; a surgery with a 300% mortality rate; searching the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: From a headless chicken that lives over one year, to an out-of-this-world "celestial body" where it rains molten glass, the team explores the most astonishing bodies through these truly unbelievable stories.

programme.title: The Murder of Laci Peterson
programme.desc: Laci Peterson, eight months pregnant, goes missing in Modesto, Calif., prompting a massive search and an intense police focus on her husband, Scott.

programme.title: The Murder of Laci Peterson
programme.desc: The appearance of Scott Peterson's girlfriend, Amber Frey, increases media attention on the case.

programme.title: The Murder of Laci Peterson
programme.desc: The bodies of Laci Peterson and her child turn up in San Francisco Bay; police arrest Scott Peterson, who soon becomes a national villain.

programme.title: The Murder of Laci Peterson
programme.desc: The prosecution asks for the death penalty for the murders of Laci and Conner Peterson, while the defense claims Scott Peterson is "stone cold innocent."

programme.title: The Murder of Laci Peterson
programme.desc: The jury wrestles with the facts in the Peterson case and produces a verdict that many people welcome.

programme.title: The Killing of JonBenet: Her Father Speaks
programme.desc: Offers never-before-seen details including her dads response to the 20th anniversary, a 1998 interview with her brother and damning DNA evidence.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All
programme.desc: In 1989, 21-year-old Lyle and 18-year-old Erik Menendez walked into their parents' den and killed them. In this limited series premiere, Erik Menendez himself shares in stunning detail the events of the week leading up to the murders and the motive behind the crime that shocked America.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All
programme.desc: The Trial of the Century takes a shocking turn when the defense says Erik and Lyle Menendez killed their parents after years of sexual abuse.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All
programme.desc: Erik Menendez recalls his mother's decline in the years leading up to the murders and looks on in agony as his brother Lyle testifies, vividly describing the abuse at the hands of their father.

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All
programme.desc: The first trial ends in a stunning surprise verdict. Erik alone takes us inside the prep for his second trial, his unlikely connection with OJ Simpson, and why he alone is left to speak for both the brothers

programme.title: The Menendez Murders: Erik Tells All
programme.desc: After the verdict comes in, at the last minute, Erik Menendez and his brother, Lyle, are sent to separate prisons. Erik marries and begins to mount an appeal. Will his case be given another chance?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Police must wait 30 years for advances in DNA technology to help solve a case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the police coerced the boy's confession and that the real killer is still on the loose.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: A scheme to bribe a country music magazine to manipulate the charts leads to murder in Nashville and a 13-year hunt for the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: When an adulterous church deacon is found shot to death in the back seat of his car, it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: On February 2, 2010, two gunmen shoot a man, rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.
